replies.body:
I'd keep it a simple, one word name.
Ofc, a catchy one word name is kinda hard to find.

So if you use 2 or 3 words for your name, do like NameNameName, not Name_Name_Name. Don't do xXNameXx or anything like that.

And don't use;
PVP
HD
or
YT.

(I know my name is "steven5703" which has numbers in it, but it's been the name I've been using since I was 6, it kinda grows on me c:)

Personally, I like 99250.
replies.body_tagged:
